typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		ownerAgencyName as string,
		name as string,
		applications as string,
		projectStatus as string,
		businessValue as string,
		projectRisk as string,
		{lifecycleCustom:plan} as string,
		{lifecycleCustom:phaseIn} as string,
		{lifecycleCustom:phaseOut} as string,
		{lifecycleCustom:endOfLife} as string,
		{lifecycleCustom:actualCompletion} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ovahu
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> curatedsql
ovahu, curatedsql union(byName: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1))~> Union1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['results'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
